useful_title: A Brief History of the Earth
best_gem_comment: This course is a really easy introduction to earth and planetary sciences. I'm a CS concentrator and I took this class as an elective with a friend, and it was a GEM. Only 4 labs throughout the semester that are all pretty easy, and a midterm + final that you will be more than well–prepared for, even if you can't make it to class often.
best_gem_comment_short: I'm a CS concentrator and I took this class as an elective with a friend, and it was a GEM.
